channel.title: 718 RuneSoul BETA
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4ziOYvG.png[/img] RuneSoul Development Team would like to introduce you to RUNESOUL BETA PUBLIC RELEASE V1.0!!!! [URL=http://"http://runesoul.org/index.php?act=idx"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/5bx56tkmunj12aq/RuneSoul718.jar"]Client[/URL] Webclient is being worked on!
Here's some pictures: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZyvXO6W.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hdpNIyS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xsALYZ9.png[/img] All minigames work 100%
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r7pP2AP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EFl98dy.png[/img] All bosses work just like real runescape!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UkaxobbO7fA
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ot2ab5Q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/adurIwD.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ywUrBiW.png[/img]
other information: Working pest control Working Soul Wars Working Castle Wars Working Duel Arena Flawless PK Working Ring Of Stone/Easter ring C key chest Not too slow, nor too fast EXP training Cannon fully works More to come![/CENTER]

item.title: 718 RuneSoul BETA
item.dc:creator: @Solax Solax
item.description:
@Solax wrote:

[CENTER]
RuneSoul Development Team would like to introduce you to RUNESOUL BETA PUBLIC RELEASE V1.0!!!
[URL=http://“http://runesoul.org/index.php?act=idx”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“https://www.dropbox.com/s/5bx56tkmunj12aq/RuneSoul718.jar”]Client[/URL]
Webclient is being worked on!

Here’s some pictures:



All minigames work 100%



All bosses work just like real runescape!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UkaxobbO7fA



other information:
Working pest control
Working Soul Wars
Working Castle Wars
Working Duel Arena
Flawless PK
Working Ring Of Stone/Easter ring
C key chest
Not too slow, nor too fast EXP training
Cannon fully works
More to come![/CENTER]
